data.title: Village School
data.meta_description: Nestled on 8 acres in Melbourne's East, Village School is a private primary school committed to inspiring children to be resourceful, independent learners.
data.text:
Small School with a Big Heart

Village School is an independent, democratic primary school

Our primary school is located on 8 acres of bush in Croydon North in the Eastern Suburbs of Melbourne and provides a varied educational experience for children aged 5 to 13. We delight and inspire young children to be resourceful, independent learners, and to explore and learn in a supportive, caring environment.

Village School celebrates individual differences and encourages children to develop an awareness of their place in Australian society and the global community.

Contact us to organise a personalised tour of Village School to see how our cooperative and compassionate learning environment can help your child to thrive.

Our Approach

We inspire young children to discover and learn in a supportive, caring environment.

Curriculum

By adapting the curriculum to suit the needs of each student and the school community, we develop a love of learning and the skills to succeed in life.

Programs

Our focus at Village School is always on using practical, real-life experience to help students grasp important concepts and develop the skills that will serve them in life.

Why Village School?

Independent learning

Children are empowered to plan, structure, self-manage and self-evaluate their own learning.

Mutual respect

Teachers and students address each other on a first-name basis as a reflection of mutual respect.

Working together

Children learn to work as part of a team, to respect others and be sensitive to their needs

A caring community

We aim to create an environment that is warm and friendly - our children can feel happy and secure.

Lifelong learning

We aim to nurture a lifelong love of learning, by keeping education relevant, meaningful and engaging.

Valuing individuals

We understand that each child is unique, with their own individual skills, interests and learning styles.

The Village School Experience
